summary: This is an email chain from April 26, 2019, between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel discussing scheduling a meeting with Brad Weinshiemer and preparing an update memo on the Epstein case. The emails show internal coordination about case updates and meeting logistics.

persons.name: Brad Weinshiemer
persons.role: Person to be met with by US Attorney's Office
persons.context: Mentioned as someone from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York is going to meet with him on Monday regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Scheduled meeting with Brad Weinshiemer
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Monday (April 29, 2019) between someone from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and Brad Weinshiemer regarding the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively working on the Epstein case as of April 2019.
A meeting was scheduled for April 29, 2019, with Brad Weinshiemer, indicating ongoing investigative or legal coordination.
Internal emails show requests for an update memo on case progress, next steps, and actions taken since the last update.
The email chain indicates the update memo was for internal use within the USANYS office, not for immediate transmission to Washington DC.
